venue.name: Teaching Commons University of Canberra
venue.address: Building 1, Level C (above the refectory), University of Canberra, Bruce, ACT
venue.under_18: At this Venue you must be accompanied by a Guardian at all times
venue.public_transport: [Public transport](Public transport is available) is available. [Eight different bus routes](http://www.canberra.edu.au/on-campus/parking/bus-bike-and-fleet-vehicles) service the university on weekends.
venue.parking: Plenty of [parking is available](http://www.canberra.edu.au/maps/parking). It's free after 6.00pm and on weekends.
